dialogs.text: NewImage00 What are you trying to do here?

choices.text: I just want to get to know my roommate. She's never talked to me before.

dialogs.text: Oh, that sounds tricky. You'll both have to communicate in a way that you can understand each other. Maybe I can help with that! ...But I'm too hungry to think about something like that right now. When do I get my red polka-dotted mushroom? A long time ago, I spent a week climbing this huge tree with a great view of the forest. Maybe you could spot something from there.
